title: woman raising hand: medium-light skin tone

verbs: To express something by a gesture or gestures.
To say or express through gestures.
Show, express or direct through movement
To show, express or direct through movements.
nouns: A woman is a female human.
An animal of the sex that produces eggs.
An adult human member of the sex that produces ova and bears young.
An adult female person (as opposed to a man)
The use of movements, especially of the hands, to communicate familiar or prearranged signals
A gesture is a form of non-verbal communication or non-vocal communication in which visible bodily actions communicate particular messages, either in place of, or in conjunction with, speech.
Form of non-verbal communication or non-vocal communication
A quick movement of a finger or pen on a screen that the computer interprets as a command, rather than as a mouse movement, writing, or drawing.
The use of movements (especially of the hands) to communicate familiar or prearranged signals

description: The Woman Raising Hand, Type-3 emoji is a sequence of the  Happy Person Raising One Hand,  Emoji Modifier Fitzpatrick Type-3, ? Female S
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, a woman with a medium-light skin tone is captured in the act of raising her hand, her expression one of eager participation and readiness, rendered with Apple's signature soft, rounded edges. Her arm is raised with clear, decisive lines, and the realistic lighting emphasizes a friendly and approachable demeanor. This emoji on Apple devices is ideal for signaling a desire to speak, ask a question, or offer assistance with enthusiasm and clarity.
